DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the plasma levels of CRD007 in patients with abdominal aortic aneurysms after the administration of single doses of tablets containing 10, 25 and 40 mg CRD007.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of CRD007 in Patients With Abdominal Aorta Aneurisms.
DOC.criteria: Infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm Significant concurrent disease or medical conditions that are deemed to interfere with the pharmacokinetics or the safety of CRD007 conduct of the trial
